transcript: have you ever bought something that you were like this is amazing and when you go to your aunt you're like you got to try these shoes on the thing that will fix your tone is actually believing in the product we see this with sales teams and I can tell you I can fix a sales team rather than training them on drilling obstacle overcomes and things like that by simply saying what's happened in the last seven days 14 days 30 days that made you believe in this class and solving for that and sometimes there's a legitimate problem with a product or a service and it's like we're on it and then we start giving them updates every day of the things that we're doing to solve the problem that they brought up we're getting to the heart of it if you don't believe in it you shouldn't sell
